alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:12PM CDT until April 16 at 2:21AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall back below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Black River Annapolis 8.0 8.1 Thu 7 pm 6.2 5.3 5.0 4.8 4.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
